CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Sensitivity analysis for policy tuning
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will have the ability to view a sensitivity analysis, which shows the count of users in the organization that would meet specific indicator thresholds. The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Multilayer structuring, customization, and branding for learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: This feature set brings new functionality to learning academies. Multi-layer structuring allows users to organize content and learning paths under multiple levels. Branding capabilities include the customization of the academy logo and the background image. Customization allows users to hide or show individual components of an academy like featured sets and  learner profile cards.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Multilayer structuring, customization, and branding for learning academies
OldVersion.description: This feature set brings new functionality to learning academies. Multi-layer structuring allows users to organize content and learning paths under multiple levels. Branding capabilities include the customization of the academy logo and the background image. Customization allows users to hide or show individual components of an academy like featured sets and  learner profile cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recap changes over more time
CurrentVersion.description: Recapping the changes you made in Loop is no longer limited to the current session. You can now recap changes that were made over a longer period of time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
CurrentVersion.description: Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
OldVersion.description: Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
OldVersion.description: Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Use the Egress API to provide learner access to “My Learning” records
CurrentVersion.description: The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Use the Egress API to provide learner access to “My Learning” records
OldVersion.description: The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 3x3 video gallery on dual displays for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Dual display rooms are now capable of presenting up to 18 videos (3x3 on each screen) when no content is being shared during meetings. This enhancement ensures a uniform experience across both Windows and Android Teams Rooms devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 3x3 video gallery on dual displays for Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: Dual display rooms are now capable of presenting up to 18 videos (3x3 on each screen) when no content is being shared during meetings. This enhancement ensures a uniform experience across both Windows and Android Teams Rooms devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
OldVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues App to add Monitor Whisper Barge and Takeover
CurrentVersion.description: Authorized users will be able to enter into a monitoring session with selected agents for private coaching. They can listen to customer calls, whisper to the agents for private message, even barge into or takeover the call.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Queues App to add Monitor Whisper Barge and Takeover
OldVersion.description: Authorized users will be able to enter into a monitoring session with selected agents for private coaching. They can listen to customer calls, whisper to the agents for private message, even barge into or takeover the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Once you connect your asset library hosted with Templafy to Microsoft365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Multi-language posts
CurrentVersion.description: Authors of Viva Engage posts will be able to add multiple manually written translations to a single post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New Viva Glint Tenant Administrator Role
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce the upcoming Viva Glint Tenant Administrator role in Microsoft Entra. With this role, admins will have dedicated permissions to manage Viva Glint-related settings in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center (MAC), without requiring the elevated privileges of Global or User admin roles. This role is essential for users who need to: read and configure all settings of Viva Glint in MAC, assign Viva Glint service admins, and create or manage Azure support tickets.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New Viva Glint Tenant Administrator Role
OldVersion.description: We are excited to announce the upcoming Viva Glint M365 Tenant Administrator role in Microsoft Entra. With this role, admins will have dedicated permissions to manage Viva Glint-related settings in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center (MAC), without requiring the elevated privileges of Global or User admin roles. This role is essential for users who need to: read and configure all settings of Viva Glint in MAC, assign Viva Glint service admins, and create or manage Azure support tickets.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution in Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition, transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in Teams Rooms on Android. Intelligent speaker functionalities are brought to existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams Premium in meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. This feature requires a Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add Allow/Off mode for each Action type overall enforcement
CurrentVersion.description: Currently Endpoint DLP only supports Audit only, Block, Block with override. This feature will add Off and Allow. Off means Endpoint DLP will not fire any event/Alert and will not trigger any toast. Customer can use this enforcement mode to have restriction for specific group. Allow means Endpoint DLP will not fire any Alert and will not trigger any toast but will fire event on Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Agents in Teams Channels
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint agents can be used in a Teams Channel similar to how they can be used in a Teams Group Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint agents in Teams Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Use SharePoint agents in Teams Mobile group chats and meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint agents are available in Teams app Store
CurrentVersion.description: You can find and add SharePoint agents from the Teams app Store.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Add multiple SharePoint agents in Teams chats and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can include more than one SharePoint agent as a participant in a Teams chat or meeting.
